summary: Adds Afflicted, Dremora, Elders, and even Mannequin's as playable races.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Requirements Dawnguard and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility[/url][/b]

This mod takes four races that appear in the vanilla version skyrim and makes them fully playable. 

[b][size=4]Afflicted[/size][/b] 

Alchemy 5
Speech 5
Alteration 5
Conjuration 10
Illusion 5
Restoration 5

[b]Radical Abilities
[/b]Magic Resistance 
Disease Resistance
Poison Resistance 

[size=4]Dremora 

[/size]Two-Handed 5
Heavy Armor 5
Speech 5
Conjuration 10
Destruction 10
Illusion 5

[b]Radical Abilities
[/b]Fire Resistance 

[size=4]Elder

[/size]One-Handed 5
Two-Handed 10
Block 5
Smiting 5
Light Armor 5
Speech 5

[b]Radical Abilities 
[/b]Frost Resistance 

[size=4]Mannequin

[/size]Smiting 5
Light Armor 5
Pickpocket 10
Lockpicking 5
Sneak 10
Enchanting 5

[b]Radical Abilities[/b]

Waterbreathing [b] 
[/b]+100 Carry weight
Not slowed down by armor
author: Starmap502
